select * from ( SELECT qpr.id, qpr.type, qpr.code, qpr.title, qpr.apparatus_type, qpr.designation, qpr.duty_dept, qpr.bpm_node, qpr.create_dept, process.bpm_id, process.bpm_status AS process_bpm_status, process.bpm_push_status, process.create_time AS start_time, process.end_time AS end_time, process.access_dept, process.access_role, process.operator_user, process.operator_time, process.bpm_flag, process.bpm_remark, process.put_of_remark, 0 as resource_type FROM bus_out_buy_qpr qpr LEFT JOIN bpm_process process ON process.bus_id = qpr.id union SELECT low.id, low.type, low.code, low.title, low.apparatus_type, low.designation, low.duty_dept, low.bpm_node, low.create_dept, process.bpm_id, process.bpm_status AS process_bpm_status, process.bpm_push_status, process.create_time AS start_time, process.end_time AS end_time, process.access_dept, process.access_role, process.operator_user, process.operator_time, process.bpm_flag, process.bpm_remark, process.put_of_remark, 1 as resource_type FROM bus_process_low low LEFT JOIN bpm_process process ON process.bus_id = low.id where low.is_hide_approve = 0 ) as temp
and ( temp.title like CONCAT("%", #{vo.searchKey}, "%") or temp.code like CONCAT("%", #{vo.searchKey}, "%") )
and temp.process_bpm_status = 2 and (temp.access_dept like CONCAT('%', #{vo.deptId}, '%') or temp.access_dept = 0) and (temp.access_role like CONCAT('%', #{vo.roleId}, '%') or temp.access_role = 0)
and (temp.process_bpm_status = 3 or temp.process_bpm_status = 4) and temp.operator_user = #{vo.userId} and temp.access_dept != -1 and temp.access_role != -1
and temp.bpm_push_status = 1 and temp.create_dept = #{vo.deptId}
